11#ifndef RTC_BASE_OPENSSL_DIGEST_H_
12#define RTC_BASE_OPENSSL_DIGEST_H_
13
14#include <openssl/ossl_typ.h>
15#include <stddef.h>
16
17#include <string>
18
19#include "rtc_base/message_digest.h"
20
21namespace rtc {
22
23// An implementation of the digest class that uses OpenSSL.
24class OpenSSLDigest final : public MessageDigest {
25 public:
26 // Creates an OpenSSLDigest with |algorithm| as the hash algorithm.
27 explicit OpenSSLDigest(const std::string& algorithm);
28 ~OpenSSLDigest() override;
29 // Returns the digest output size (e.g. 16 bytes for MD5).
30 size_t Size() const override;
31 // Updates the digest with |len| bytes from |buf|.
32 void Update(const void* buf, size_t len) override;
33 // Outputs the digest value to |buf| with length |len|.
34 size_t Finish(void* buf, size_t len) override;
35
36 // Helper function to look up a digest's EVP by name.
37 static bool GetDigestEVP(const std::string& algorithm, const EVP_MD** md);
38 // Helper function to look up a digest's name by EVP.
39 static bool GetDigestName(const EVP_MD* md, std::string* algorithm);
40 // Helper function to get the length of a digest.
41 static bool GetDigestSize(const std::string& algorithm, size_t* len);
42
43 private:
44 EVP_MD_CTX* ctx_ = nullptr;
45 const EVP_MD* md_;
46};
47
48} // namespace rtc
49
50#endif // RTC_BASE_OPENSSL_DIGEST_H_
51
